channel.title: Reports on Save Marsden Point
channel.description: Recent content in Reports on Save Marsden Point

item.title: Oil Security in NZ
item.description: MBIE Oil security in New Zealand https://www.interest.co.nz/public-policy/115592/government-planning-nzs-first-ever%C2%A0comprehensive-freight-and-supply-chain we put refinery capacity in the failure chain so we can have failures in Foreign crude production Shipping (Crude) Refining Shipping (Distillate) NZTA takes control New Zealand | Imports and Exports Marsden Point to halt bitumen production New Zealand prepares for shifts in bitumen supply Addressing New Zealand’s oil Security in 2040 How might changes in the geopolitical environment affect the efficacy of New Zealand’s current oil security assessments and policies out to 2040?

item.title: MBIE Disscussion Document - Accelerating renewable energy
item.description: The release of the MBIE document advising against a future for refining (as they had done for oil and gas exploration and production) came just before the Covid demand shock and after a long period of profit extraction by the shareholders and low refining margins because of excess capacity oversaes. 2020-04-20 RNZ to engage with MBIE with regard to security of fuel supply for New Zealand importance of refining capability and optionality for fuel supply the contribution of RNZ to the Northland economy the role of RNZ’s skills and assets in a transition to lower carbon fuels MBIE - Accelerating renewable energy
